post.description: This route is used for OAuth authentication methods to verify and login/create an account.

parameters.description: The OAuth code passed back from the provider. Part of the PKCE flow.
parameters.name: code

parameters.description: The state containing a base64 encoded version of the nonce, provider, and redirect url.
parameters.name: state

parameters.description: The nonce for comparing against the callback state decoded to prevent CSRF attacks.
parameters.name: sh_auth_nonce

200.description: OK: User is logged in successfully

Set-Cookie.description: Sets a sh_session cookie to signify auth status

302.description: Found: Logged in and redirected to a requested location

Set-Cookie.description: Sets a sh_session cookie to signify auth status

400.description: Bad Request: Something went wrong with the request queries or their properties

403.description: Forbidden: Something went wrong verifying identity or authenticating.

502.description: Bad Gateway: Authenticating OAuth server did not respond or user does not exist

get.description: Get or search for users by name or email. If no search term is provided, returns all users with pagination.

parameters.name: offset
